Computer.name: Paul's PC
Computer.file: - pay for hosting - configure web server (37833d00) - meet with the guy next week, 1930 SHARP - project deadline's in two months; better get started with it now

The ThemeChanger application is designed to give Netizen OS machines a new paradigm of customisation! Using x-server.sys files is a lot easier as the program performs the sideloading process without requiring a restart
